definition: to invigorate blood circulation and alleviate pain (idiom)

sentences.english: Protect the stomach and relieve the pain.
He was getting through games last season on painkilling injections.
sentences.chinese: 去季他都是在注射止痛剂的情况下坚持上场的。

sentences.english: He took some anodyne to relieve the pain.
sentences.chinese: 他吃了些止痛药来缓解疼痛。

sentences.english: I'll give you a shot of a painkiller.
sentences.chinese: 我会帮你打一针止痛针。

sentences.english: Pumpkin pleasant is lukewarm, the beneficial in can filling is angry, know wind acetanilide, detoxify kills insect.
sentences.chinese: 南瓜甘温，能补中益气，通络止痛，解毒杀虫。

sentences.english: Clinical Study on the Pathogenic Characters of Extremity Superficial Thrombophlebitis;
sentences.chinese: 目的观察散瘀止痛汤治疗血栓性静脉炎的效果。

sentences.english: No pregnant women use any analgesic or hypnotic agent. 2h.
sentences.chinese: 术前2小时内未用任何镇静或止痛药物。

sentences.english: Some of them come in quite frequently, and the most prescribed drug is the painkiller.
sentences.chinese: 其中有些人经常来，而最常开的药方则是止痛药。

sentences.english: Today I'll drill a little hole in the tooth for pus-drainage to stop the pain.
sentences.chinese: 今天先在牙上钻个小洞将脓引流出来，这样可以止痛。

sentences.english: The analgesic effects of acupuncture are well-documented.
sentences.chinese: 针灸止痛的效果是举世公认的。

sentences.english: The key function is removing stasis, stopping blood and pain, activating blood, detoxication, relieving swelling.
sentences.chinese: 化瘀止血，活血止痛，解毒消肿。

sentences.english: Conclusion The experimental group has quick reliving effectiveness and good curative effectiveness which excel remarkably the control group.
sentences.chinese: 结论实验组止痛快，疗效好，明显优于对照组。

sentences.english: Have you had trouble with sleeping or pain pills is the past?
sentences.chinese: 过去你因为服用助眠药或止痛药有过什么不良反应吗？

sentences.english: Put this lotion on the insect gnaws to stop them hurting.
sentences.chinese: 在虫子叮的场地抹点这种水儿止痛。

sentences.english: Clinical Study on the Pathogenic Characters of Superficial Thrombophlebitis;
sentences.chinese: 目的观察散瘀止痛汤治疗血栓性静脉炎的效果。

sentences.english: Conclusion Duhuo Jisheng decoction combined analgesic treatment is very effective for bone metastases.
sentences.chinese: 结论独活寄生汤联合止痛治疗使肿瘤骨转移患者获益。

definition: to invigorate blood circulation and alleviate pain (idiom)
to relieve (cold, rheumatic pain etc)/lit. to dispel pathogenic wind (TCM)
injury such as contusion, sprain or fracture from falling, blow etc
to alleviate fever (medicine)/to clear internal heat (Chinese medicine)
to detoxify/to relieve fever (in Chinese medicine)
